price: Saa berε no, ntwitwagyeε anaasε tumi no nyinaa wͻ Nyankopͻn Nokwafoͻ no. Ɔno na otua akatua pa, na Ne hͻ ne awieε pa no.
arabic: هُنَالِكَ ٱلۡوَلَٰيَةُ لِلَّهِ ٱلۡحَقِّۚ هُوَ خَيۡرٞ ثَوَابٗا وَخَيۡرٌ عُقۡبٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: hunālika al-walāyatu lillahi al-ḥaqi huwa khayrun thawāban wakhayrun ʿuq'ban
